# Plot the data from each dataset using a scatter plot.
```{r}
# Line Chart
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data, aes(x= YEAR, y=JAN)) + geom_area() + ggtitle("Area Chart R")
```

```{r}
# Step Chart
library(ggplot2)
df <- read.csv("unemployement-rate-1948-2010.csv")
ggplot(df, aes(x = Year, y =Value, fill=Period)) + geom_area()+ ggtitle("Stacked Area Chart R")
```

```{r}
# Step Chart
library(treemap)
treemap(df,
            index=c("Year"),
            vSize="Value",
            title="Treemap R"
            ) 
```
